column1: Play: Create 4 Time Bombs in your deck, then Predict.
I've seen you destroy 2 allied Time Bombs.

Over many years, Zilean established a network of promising young mages from different times, all of whom were capable of seeing out his life's work should the unthinkable happen. Although a kind and encouraging mentor, deep sorrow creased his brow when he sought solitude, and there was a weariness in his eyes that only someone who has lived multiple lifetimes could hope to comprehend.
